stories.iWant: to include an indicator when a project is behind schedule
acceptanceCriteria: The user can include an indicator when a project is behind schedule.
If the action cannot be completed, the system provides a clear error message.

evidence.quote: Alex (Customer): The dashboard should include an indicator when a project is behind schedule.

stories.iWant: to update their tasks directly in the app
acceptanceCriteria: The user can update their tasks directly in the app.
If the action cannot be completed, the system provides a clear error message.

evidence.quote: Alex (Customer): Team members need to update their tasks directly in the app.

acceptanceCriteria: The user can remind them automatically.
If the action cannot be completed, the system provides a clear error message.

evidence.quote: Alex (Customer): If someone has an overdue task or an upcoming deadline, the app should remind them automatically.

stories.iWant: to everyone see the same information?
acceptanceCriteria: The user can everyone see the same information?.
If the action cannot be completed, the system provides a clear error message.

evidence.quote: Should everyone see the same information?

stories.iWant: to Project managers need full visibility across all projects
acceptanceCriteria: The manager can Project managers need full visibility across all projects.
If the action cannot be completed, the system provides a clear error message.

evidence.quote: Alex (Customer): Project managers need full visibility across all projects.

stories.iWant: to only see the tasks they’re assigned to
acceptanceCriteria: The user can only see the tasks they’re assigned to.
The user can only see the tasks they’re assigned to.

evidence.quote: Alex (Customer): Individual contributors should only see the tasks they’re assigned to.

acceptanceCriteria: The user can view progress.
The user cannot edit anything.

evidence.quote: Alex (Customer): Executives should be able to view progress, but not edit anything.

stories.iWant: to export project summaries to PDF or Excel
acceptanceCriteria: The user can export project summaries to PDF or Excel.
If the action cannot be completed, the system provides a clear error message.

evidence.quote: Alex (Customer): We need to export project summaries to PDF or Excel.

stories.iWant: to sync to our calendars automatically
acceptanceCriteria: The user can sync to our calendars automatically.
If the action cannot be completed, the system provides a clear error message.

evidence.quote: Alex (Customer): Project deadlines should sync to our calendars automatically.

followUpQuestions: Which user roles/personas should we prioritize?
What are the acceptance criteria for each story (success + error cases)?
Are there non-functional requirements (latency, audit, security) that apply?
